Instance.description: Using the crafting process saved in the target, restart the crafting process by pushing the correct SI for the phase that is the next step in the process.

Tunable.name: create_unavailable_recipe_description
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

TunableEnum.name: resume_phase_name
TunableEnum.description: The name of the phase to resume for this certain resume interaction. None means starts at current phase.
